title: Concentrated Solar Plant (CSP)
description: An open dataset for Concentrated Solar Plant (CSP)

sources.name: Concentrating Solar Power Projects by Technology
Concentrating Solar Power - From Research To Implementation
Analysis of Concentrated Solar Power Technologies' Feasibility , Selection and Promotional Strategy for Bangladesh - Journal of Mechanical Engineering, Vol. ME 44, No. 2
Renewable Energy Technologies Cost Analysis Series: Concentrating Solar Power - Volume 1: Power Sector Issue 2/5
Parabolic Trough Collector Cost  Update for the System Advisor  Model (SAM)
Renewable Power Generation Costs in 2012: An Overview
Conceptual design of a concentrating solar power plant for a combined electricity and water supply of the city El Gouna
